PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{ <https://opendata.brussels.be/api/v2/catalog/exports/ttl> ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ <http://data.gov.be/catalog/bxlcity> dcat:dataset ?dataset }
WHERE
	{
		{ <https://opendata.brussels.be/api/v2/catalog/exports/ttl> dcat:dataset ?dataset }
	UNION
		{ <https://opendata.brussels.be/api/v2/catalog/exports/ttl> ?p ?o }
	}
